title: (x) "Thirsty for intimacy" DIN-style tech sans caps - Pill Gothic {Curtis S}
content:
Would appreciate help in ID for the enclosed jpeg.  
Thanks.  
Mara

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705160755im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/JIM_6089.jpg)

 [‹ (x) "Golf Club" script in Jade Palace Golf Club logo - Bodoni Italic {Mike Y}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705160755/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45538 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Sigmo Express WFO logo - Nosferatu, Rebuffed {Artwork Solutions (self)} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705160755/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45525 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mkstudio

comments.content: Thanks, but I don’t think the CMSO letters are a perfect match. I appreciate your response.

THANK YOU! Pill GOthic looks perfect!!! Bravo.  
Mara

Pill Gothic is correct and a nice font indeed. A similar design i like as well  
that looks similar is CP Company by FABRIZIO SCHIAVI DESIGN [http://www.fsd.it/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705160755/http:/www.fsd.it/ "http://www.fsd.it/")
I like Pill too. Thanks for recommending CP.
